episodes.title: 2-Time Cult Survivor Mindy Conway
episodes.description: Mindy was raised Jehovah's Witness and survived only to later find as an adult her mega-church in Texas turned QAnon. She shares the story of how she got out and saw the light both times, as well as tips for those with loved ones who are still in a cult on how to reach them and help them out. #QAnon #IGotOut Resources: Dr. Hassan's Cult Center: https://freedomofmind.com/ Jim Stewartson's X: https://x.com/jimstewartson Dave Troy's X: https://x.com/davetroy
